item.title: Bureaucracies 'cannibalizing our nation' lawmaker says, expressing empathy for federal workers facing job cuts
item.description: Rep. Clay Higgins expresses empathy for federal workers facing joblessness, but says bureaucracies have been "cannibalizing our nation."
